    • Method Detail

      • allcourses

        @GetMapping("/allcourses")
public edu.tntech.csc2310.dashboard.data.SemesterSchedule allcourses​(@RequestParam(value="term",defaultValue="na")
                                                                     java.lang.String term)
        Courses return a SemesterSchedule object that has a list of all of the courses in the given semester. If a invalid term is entered, the Schedule object will be empty

        NOTE: Spring: 10 Summer: 50 Fall: 80

        Parameters:
        term - (String) enter in a term, in format of YearTerm (yyyytt) EX: 202010
        Returns:
        Semester Schedule object (has a SubjectTerm, CourseInstance array)

      • coursesbysubject

        @GetMapping("/coursesbysubject")
public edu.tntech.csc2310.dashboard.data.SemesterSchedule coursesbysubject​(@RequestParam(value="subject",defaultValue="CSC")
                                                                           java.lang.String subject,
                                                                           @RequestParam(value="term",defaultValue="202210")
                                                                           java.lang.String term)
        Allcourses returns a SemesterSchedule object with a list of all the courses in a given year and subject/department. If either term or subject is invalid it will return an empty array.

        NOTE: Spring: 10 Summer: 50 Fall: 80

        Parameters:
        subject - (String) enter the subject code EX: csc EX: ENGL
        term - (String) enter in a term, in format of YearTerm (yyyytt) EX:202010 EX: 202280
        Returns:
        SemesterSechulde Object (has a SubjectTerm, CourseInstance array)

      • coursesbyfaculty

        @GetMapping("/coursesbyfaculty")
public java.util.ArrayList<edu.tntech.csc2310.dashboard.data.CourseInstance> coursesbyfaculty​(@RequestParam(value="subject",defaultValue="CSC")
                                                                                              java.lang.String subject,
                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="term",defaultValue="202210")
                                                                                              java.lang.String term,
                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="lastname",defaultValue="Gannod")
                                                                                              java.lang.String lastname,
                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="firstname",defaultValue="Gerald C")
                                                                                              java.lang.String firstname)
        Coursesbyfaculty gets all courses in a subject at 1 term and then filters the list of courses taught by a given professor/faculty member. If any of the parameters are invaid, code will return an empty list

        NOTE: Spring: 10 Summer: 50 Fall: 80

        Parameters:
        subject - (String) subject enter the subject code EX: csc EX: ENGL
        term - (String) enter in a term, in format of YearTerm (yyyytt) EX: 202010
        lastname - (String) enter in the last name of professor EX: Gannod EX: Crockett
        firstname - (String) enter in the firstname and middle name EX: Gerald C EX: April Renee
        Returns:
        CourseInstance array

      • coursebysection

        @GetMapping("/coursebysection")
public edu.tntech.csc2310.dashboard.data.CourseInstance coursebysection​(@RequestParam(value="subject",defaultValue="CSC")
                                                                        java.lang.String subject,
                                                                        @RequestParam(value="term",defaultValue="202210")
                                                                        java.lang.String term,
                                                                        @RequestParam(value="course",defaultValue="2310")
                                                                        java.lang.String course,
                                                                        @RequestParam(value="section",defaultValue="001")
                                                                        java.lang.String section)
        Coursebysection finds a specific course section when given a term, subject, course number, and section number. If any of the paramters are invalid, a emtpy CourseInstance object will be returned

        NOTE: Spring: 10 Summer: 50 Fall: 80

        Parameters:
        subject - (String) subject enter the subject code EX: csc EX: ENGL
        term - (String) enter in a term, in format of YearTerm (yyyytt) EX: 202010
        course - (String) course number EX: 2310
        section - (String) course section number EX: 001 EX: 104
        Returns:
        Courseinstance object (has a subjectTerm, Faculty, other info about course)

      • creditHours

        @GetMapping("/schbydepartment")
public edu.tntech.csc2310.dashboard.data.SubjectCreditHours creditHours​(@RequestParam(value="subject",defaultValue="CSC")
                                                                        java.lang.String subject,
                                                                        @RequestParam(value="term",defaultValue="202210")
                                                                        java.lang.String term)
        schbydepartment calculates the total amount of student credit hours generated by a specific department/subject in a given term.

        NOTE: Spring: 10 Summer: 50 Fall: 80

        Parameters:
        subject - (String) subject enter the subject code EX: csc EX: ENGL
        term - (String) enter in a term, in format of YearTerm (yyyytt) EX:202010
        Returns:
        returns a SubjectCreditHours object (has a subjectTerm, total sch generated)

      • creditHoursByFaculty

        @GetMapping("/schbyfaculty")
public edu.tntech.csc2310.dashboard.data.FacultyCreditHours creditHoursByFaculty​(@RequestParam(value="subject",defaultValue="CSC")
                                                                                 java.lang.String subject,
                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="term",defaultValue="202210")
                                                                                 java.lang.String term,
                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="lastname",defaultValue="Gannod")
                                                                                 java.lang.String lastname,
                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="firstname",defaultValue="Gerald C")
                                                                                 java.lang.String firstname)
        schbyfaculty calculates the total amount of student credit hours generated by a professor.

        NOTE: Spring: 10 Summer: 50 Fall: 80

        Parameters:
        subject - (String) subject enter the subject code EX: csc EX: ENGL
        term - (String) enter in a term, in format of YearTerm (yyyytt) EX: 202010
        lastname - (String) enter in the last name of professor EX: Gannod EX: Crockett
        firstname - (String) enter in the firstname and middle name EX: Gerald C EX: April Renee
        Returns:
        returns a FacultyCreditHours object (has a faculty, subjectCreditHours)

      • schbydeptandterms

        @GetMapping("/schbydeptandterms")
public edu.tntech.csc2310.dashboard.data.SubjectCreditHours[] schbydeptandterms​(@RequestParam(value="subject",defaultValue="na")
                                                                                java.lang.String subject,
                                                                                @RequestParam(value="beginterm",defaultValue="na")
                                                                                java.lang.String beginterm,
                                                                                @RequestParam(value="endterm",defaultValue="na")
                                                                                java.lang.String endterm)
        schbydeptandterms finds the total student credit hours generated by a department within a given range of yearsterms. The code will find the total credit hours generated of spring, summer, and fall terms between the range.

        NOTE: Spring: 10 Summer: 50 Fall: 80

        NOTE: beginterm should be older/ less than endterm.

        Parameters:
        subject - (String) subject enter the subject code EX: csc EX: ENGL
        beginterm - (String) begin term of a range of yearterms (yyyytt) EX: 202010
        endterm - (String) end term of a range of yearterms (yyyytt) EX: 202210
        Returns:
        array of SubjectCreditHours

      • schbydeptandtermlist

        @GetMapping("schbydeptandtermlist")
public edu.tntech.csc2310.dashboard.data.SubjectCreditHours[] schbydeptandtermlist​(@RequestParam(value="subject",defaultValue="na")
                                                                                   java.lang.String subject,
                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="termlist",defaultValue="na")
                                                                                   java.lang.String termlist)
        Schbydeptandtermlist finds the total student credit hours generated by a department in a list of yearsterms. The code will find the total credit hours generated of spring, summer, and fall terms between the range.

        NOTE: Spring: 10 Summer: 50 Fall: 80

        NOTE: beginterm should be older/ less than endterm.

        Parameters:
        subject - (String) subject enter the subject code EX: csc EX: ENGL
        termlist - (String) List of yearTerm (yyyytt) separtated by comma EX: "202210,201780,201950"
        Returns:
        Array of Subject Credit Hours

      • schbyfacultyandterms

        @GetMapping("schbyfacultyandterms")
public edu.tntech.csc2310.dashboard.data.FacultyCreditHours[] schbyfacultyandterms​(@RequestParam(value="subject",defaultValue="na")
                                                                                   java.lang.String subject,
                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="firstname",defaultValue="na")
                                                                                   java.lang.String firstname,
                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="lastname",defaultValue="na")
                                                                                   java.lang.String lastname,
                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="beginterm",defaultValue="na")
                                                                                   java.lang.String beginterm,
                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="endterm",defaultValue="na")
                                                                                   java.lang.String endterm)
        schbyfacultyandterms finds the total student credit hours generated by a faculty in the given range of yearTerm

        NOTE: Spring: 10 Summer: 50 Fall: 80

        Parameters:
        subject - (String) subject enter the subject code EX: csc EX: ENGL
        firstname - (String) enter in the firstname and middle name EX: Gerald C EX: April Renee
        lastname - (String) enter in the last name of professor EX: Gannod EX: Crockett
        beginterm - (String) begin term of a range of yearterms (yyyytt) EX: 202010
        endterm - (String) end term of a range of yearterms (yyyytt) EX: 202210
        Returns:
        Array of facultycredithours object

        array of Faculty objects

public java.lang.String[] getallsubjects​(@RequestParam(value="term",defaultValue="na")
                                         java.lang.String term)
        getallsubjects returns a array of all of the subjects taught in a given yearterm

        NOTE: Spring: 10 Summer: 50 Fall: 80

        Parameters:
        term - (String) enter in a term, in format of YearTerm (yyyytt) EX: 202010
        Returns:
        array of string (contain subject codes)
